node.heading: Dream Catcher
node.description: Dream Catchers are known as a filter for nightmares. IT is mostly used in North America. They believes that the night air is full of dreams, both good and bad. These dream catchers will catch the nightmares and the person sleeping below this will get good dreams only

node.heading: Gatsby
node.description: This is another blog generator. It is more advanced than other blog generators
